name: M Geeka
text: Ooommmgaahh I looooovvee this pizza! Satisfaction guaranteed.  :)

name: FunkoPop Nik
text: Can't go wrong here! Delivery is always fast and pizza is always great. Just wish theyd quit giving me garlic butter when I pay extra for nacho cheese

name: James Torres
text: Best quality pizza and wings and desserts at this location. General manager who runs this store is super friendly with great customer service. You won't beat there speed of service at this location. Drop on by to make any day a better one with Papa John's pizza.

name: Jason Kern
text: These guys are terrific! I called not knowing what I wanted, Lance took the time to understand what I liked and offered up what ended up being one of the best pies I've ever had. Thanks to Lance and the rest of the North Scottsdale team, Papa Johns N. Scottsdale is our new go-to Friday night pizza place!!

name: Brittany Sova
text: Unfortunately, my pizza just arrived 56 minutes late. They've offered only flimsy excuses and a credit for future purchases. Too bad this was my first impression. You could not pay me to wait for a free pizza from this place. Dominos for the win in N. Scottsdale

name: Jason S
text: Stopped in for a pick up order. Pizza and cheese sticks were awesome . Order was ready in not even 15 min .. staff friendly. This is one of the better locations

name: Shahram Ezzati
text: the best pizza that I ate and the second one was never seen no, this is the city Well done guys who work and thanks

name: Kristyn Krueger
text: DO NOT USE CREDIT CARDS! I ordered online and didn't put a tip in because I prefer to give cash. Three days later I check my account and I was charged a different amount than the total on my email receipt. Someone at the restaurant re-ran ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Nazarian
text: Lance and Edgar provided the best customer service, will be ordering from this location more often!!

name: Greg and Dawn Greenstein
text: Okay 1st off I'm ONLY rating this a 5 tonight because of the top notch, excellent customer service we just recieved from Lance the shift supervisor at this store. ‚Ä¶More

name: Luke D
text: It takes a lot for me to write a bad review but the last two experiences with this place have been awful.  The last time I ordered it took literally 90+ minutes to get my food. The driver called saying he had to take 50 pizzas to a car ‚Ä¶More

name: Tanner Gwinn
text: Watched the manager work with an upset customer, even though he could find no record of the mans claim he listened and believed the customer.

name: J
text: These guys work extremely hard when it gets busy and are always professional.

name: Ashley Germer
text: Zack was very friendly and helpful

name: Kaleo KI
text: Very dissapointed in this specific restaurant. I got there with enough time before closing to make an half hour pizza. But they signalled me that they're closed. Also the delivery driver parked sideways taking three spaces. Will never go to ‚Ä¶More

name: Angelina Garcia-Johnson
text: WARNING!!  FOOD POISONING!!!  My children had cheese pizza at a friends from Papa John's in Scottsdale, AZ and were both very sick the next day.  For 2 days now they have been vomiting and now have fevers.  We will be going to the emergency ‚Ä¶More

name: Fr. Clayton
text: Two of the dumbest and laziest pizza delivery boys I've ever met. Not only did they not want to deliver a pizza, or let us come at midnight to pick up a carry out. they wouldn't even come 5 miles to give it to us. Talk about disappointed ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Bennett
text: Worst customer service I‚Äôve ever experienced. I will never put an order in here ever again. Management here is embarrassing.

name: Lo']['uZ
text: In terms of delivery time and freshness, second to none. Thank you for your consistency!

name: Wolfgang von Maack
text: Crappy service. Don't even bother calling because people put you on hold and when you call again and tell them you have been on hold for 5 minutes they still put you on hold.

name: Steve Denny
text: You had better luck with the corporation.  New franchise will be a hit or miss, unfortunately.

name: Roger Reed
text: The guy who appears to be the manager needs to work on his customer relations skills. I will never step foot in a Papa Johns again.

name: poeter14
text: good service. They messed up my order once but completely remade it.

name: Luke Rabbithead
text: Very good!! #Chili505

name: Kristen Miller
text: Took an hour and half to get our pizza delivered and the pizza toppings and cheese were shifted all over the place inside like  someone had shaken it up, the cheese wasn't even melted all the way and still cold in places, worst papa johns ever! üëéüèª

name: Kim Keith
text: Online ordering is much more complicated than it needs to be, a lot of repeating info when time to pay, then it said there was an error and I had to order again, frustrating!

name: Tye Rutledge
text: Great pizza

name: bradley starr
text: Ok food

name: Shannon McKinney
text: Yummy

name: Lance Stafko
text: Awesome Pizza

name: John Williams
text: Not friendly

name: Andrew Boneff
text: I loved that job

name: Ivan Sabev
text: Great Pizza crusts, and great garlic sauce.

name: George Seimon
text: Great cheap pizza

name: syd h
text: delicious

name: Oleksandra Fedkevich
text: Ridiculous...3 miles from me and they don't have a location that delivers just north of 101

name: osvaldo martinez
text:
(Translated by Google) They treated me very kindly

(Original)
Me atendieron muy amablemente
